instructions.1: Cut each banana crosswise into 6 pieces. Place 1 toothpick in each banana piece. Transfer to wax paper lined plate. Freeze 20 minutes or until solid.
instructions.2: Heat caramel sauce in microwave 10 to 20 seconds on High or until slightly melted.
instructions.3: Dip banana slices in caramel and roll into chopped nuts. Return to freezer until ready to serve.

questions.question: Is caramel sauce from Step 2 still available in Step 3?
Is caramel sauce live after Step 2?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 2?
Can we heat (Step 2) and dip (Step 3) at the same time?
